channel.title: Pages on Taming Knots
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Taming Knots

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there, my name is Brent, but I go by TK on the internet. I’m a writer, hobbyist sysadmin, video game enjoyer, linux journeyman, woodturner, and hobby tourist living in Colorado. I write this blog in my free time. If you would like to recommend something to me or suggest a story idea based on my previous posts, please feel free to drop me a line.

item.title: Connections
item.description:
The internet is a big, intimidating place. Most of it is full of algorithms, shooting “content” into your face at as fast a rate as possible to try to keep you distracted, scrolling to the next video, the next post, the next ad, the next thing. If you are tired of the endless scroll and want to look at the smaller, interconnected web, then I invite you to read from the sites below. I will endeavor to keep these lists updated with what I’m reading and enjoying.

Blogroll: The Worst Garbage

  • 70% Complete by Phil & Logan
  • Blueberry Lemonade by Kyle
  • Cassie’s Blog
  • The Happiness Collective by EG93
  • Joel’s Blog
  • Wavelengths by Brendon Bigley

Blogroll: Other Things I’m Reading

  • 82MHz Blog by Andreas
  • ATMX Photo Blog by Andy
  • The Cheapskate’s Guide to Computers and the Internet
  • The Internet Archive’s Blog
  • Musings by Benjamin Hollon
  • NJMS by Nat
  • Notes by JCProbably
  • Scrolls by Mike Sass (Shellsharks)
  • Studio Notes by Sophy Wong
  • Toast’s Notes by Toast Rider
  • Today in Tabs by Rusty Foster

Other Projects

We all have many projects. While I tend to keep myself to myself, I will put up anything that I’ve worked on made for public consumption here. Do not expect this list to update often, if at all.

  • The Worst Community Report: A podcast I do with a few friends from The Worst Garbage’s community. We talk about games, manga, anime, and all manner of other topics. Episodes release Thursdays.
  • The Worst Game Jam: Winter 2025: A game jam for The Worst Garbage community. I tend to host the Winter editions.
  • The Worst Game Jam 4: Video Game Jamtimism: The next iteration of the Worst Game Jam, coming in January 2026!

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to reach out for any reason, please use the form below to send me an email. Keep in mind the “email” field below is simply to allow me to send you a return message. You do not have to fill it out.

item.title: Legal
item.description:
Taming Knots is a static site written in markdown and interpreted/built using hugo using the Hugo-Blog-Awesome theme by Sid. The repository of posts is on GitHub and the website is built and hosted on Cloudflare Pages.

This website does not collect your personal information, although the hosting provider may do so. This is out of my control and I apologize for that.

This website is completely static (except for the contact form)

The contact form is provided by Letterbird, a service provided by Good Enough and they claim they do not sell user data in their privacy policy.

Everything written on this site, unless stated and marked otherwise, is of my own creation.

Nothing on this site is made with the use of generative AI period.

item.title: Uses
item.description:
A modern system is a constantly changing and mutating organism. Tools come and go, defaults change, things are in a constant state of flux. This is a periodically updated list of devices, tools, and services I’m using. Items in italics are things I’m looking to move away from, if I can find a suitable replacement. Items separated by a pipe (|) often work in tandem and in my setup must work together. Usually, as a back end tool and a front end GUI. Items separated by commas both do the same job, and I’m either transitioning, or I use different tools depending on the task. As an ease of recommendation, I have linked to as many tools as is feasible here.

Taming Knots

  • Editor: Typora, VS Code
  • Static Site Generator: Hugo
  • Code Repository: GitHub
  • Web Host: CloudFlare Pages
  • Domain Registration: Porkbun

The Worst Community Report

  • Host: Transistor
  • Voice/Video Calls: Discord
  • Recording: Audacity
  • Backup Recording: Craig
  • Synchronization: Time.is
  • File Transfer: Copyparty, Google Drive
  • Editing: Reaper
  • Contact Form: Letterbird

Desktop PC

Hardware

  • CPU: Ryzen 7 3800XT
  • RAM: 32GB DDR4, 3200MT/s
  • GPU: Radeon 6700XT
  • SSD: 2TB Intel NVME, 1TB NVME

Software

  • Operating System: EndeavourOS Linux (based on Arch)
  • Desktop Environment: KDE Plasma 6
  • Terminal: Kitty
  • File Manager: Dolphin
  • Text Editor: Code OSS, Typora, Obsidian
  • Audio Recording: Audacity
  • Audio Editing: Reaper
  • Web Browser: Floorp
  • Email: Thunderbird
  • Backup: Vorta | Borg

Home Server

Hardware:

  • CPU: Ryzen 5 1600
  • RAM: 16GB DDR4, 2400MT/s
  • SSD: 128GB PNY SATA
  • HDD: 3x 4TB Seagate BarraCuda 7200RPM

Software

  • Operating System: TrueNAS Scale
  • Filesystem: ZFS

Services

  • Video Hosting: Plex, Jellyfin
  • Audio Hosting: Jellyfin
  • Budget Tool: Actual Budget
  • Ebooks: Calibre Web Automated
  • File Server: CopyParty, Samba
  • Photo Backup: Immich
  • RSS Subscription Management: FreshRSS
  • VPN: Tailscale
  • Reverse Proxy: Nginx
  • Ad Blocking: AdGuard Home
  • Homeserver Backup: Storj

Phone

Hardware

  • Device: Google Pixel 7a
  • Earbuds: Galaxy Buds 2 Pro

Applications

  • Operating System: Stock (Google Pixel) Android 16
  • Web Browser: Fennec
  • File Manager: MiXplorer
  • Email: Thunderbird
  • Maps: Google Maps
  • Music: Symfonium
  • Podcasts: Podcast Addict
  • eBook reader: Moon+ Reader Pro
  • RSS Reader: Fluent Reader
  • Photos: Immich
  • Streaming Video: Plex, Jellyfin, Dropout, Youtube ReVanced
  • Notes: Obsidian, Google Keep

Gaming

Desktop PC

  • Stores: Steam, Epic Games, GOG, Itch
  • Emulators: Retroarch, PPSSPP, PCSX2, Dolphin
  • Frontends: Steam, Heroic Game Launcher, EmulationStation DE
  • Compatibility: Proton, Proton GE, ProtonUp QT
  • Controller: Xbox Series controller
  • Mouse: Logitech G502 Hero (wired)
  • Keyboard: Lily58 Choc /w White switches

Emulation Handheld

  • Hardware: Anbernic RG35XX SP (Silver)
  • Storage: 1x 64gb, 1x 128gb MicroSD
  • Modifications: Tape Mod
  • OS: MuOS Golden Goose

PSP

  • Hardware: PSP 3000
  • Modifications: Shell swap: Transparent Green, white OEM buttons/joystick
  • Custom Firmware: ARK 4
